name: Anti-hero at the bottom of the job caste system
author: Ooshio Satoshi
content: In a world where the value of existence is determined by occupation &#40class&#41, the protagonist awakens to the skills of a “thief” and is persecuted as a “harmful designated class”. One day, he is saved by Aoi, the head of Shinobi Street, a town where people who are also persecuted gather, and decides to become his friend.
